column2:
df_use %>% 
  furniture::table1("Major" = major,
                    "Reason Taking" = reason,
                    "Experimental Condition" = exp_cond,
                    "Regularly Drink Coffee" = coffee,
                    "Math Phobia" = phobia,
                    splitby =  ~ gender,
                    total = TRUE,
                    test = TRUE,
                    na.rm = FALSE,
                    output = "markdown",
                    digits = 2,
                    caption = "Descriptive Summary by Gender")
The test is for the stratified data relationships.
Warning: Chi-squared approximation may be incorrect
